title: Ticket #1726: condor_status is reporting flocked jobs when there are really none
description:
condor_status -schedd -l is showing me flocked jobs when I know there are no flocked jobs in my pool.

I'm seeing this in 7.4.4 but I can say it's been this way since 6.8.8. 

  [root@cycleserver01 cycle_server]# condor_status -schedd -l
  MyType = "Scheduler"
  TargetType = ""
  QuillEnabled = FALSE
  MyAddress = "<192.168.0.78:55204>"
  NumUsers = 1
  MaxJobsRunning = 800
  StartLocalUniverse = TotalLocalJobsRunning < 200
  StartSchedulerUniverse = TotalSchedulerJobsRunning < 200
  Name = "cycleserver01.cyclecustomer.local"
  ScheddIpAddr = "<192.168.0.78:55204>"
  VirtualMemory = 2147483647
  TotalIdleJobs = 400
  TotalRunningJobs = 0
  TotalJobAds = 400
  TotalHeldJobs = 0
  TotalFlockedJobs = 7
  TotalRemovedJobs = 0
  TotalLocalJobsIdle = 0
  TotalLocalJobsRunning = 0
  TotalSchedulerJobsIdle = 0
  TotalSchedulerJobsRunning = 0
  ScheddSwapExhausted = FALSE
  CYCLE_USE_SOAP_INTERFACE = TRUE
  MaxJobsActive = 5000
  MaxJobsTotal = 10000
  CYCLE_AGENT_PORT = 8008
  CondorVersion = "$CondorVersion: 7.4.4 Oct 14 2010 BuildID: 279383 $"
  CondorPlatform = "$CondorPlatform: I386-LINUX_RHEL5 $"
  MyCurrentTime = 1287672844
  Machine = "cycleserver01.cyclecustomer.local"
  PublicNetworkIpAddr = "<192.168.0.78:55204>"
  MonitorSelfTime = 1287672716
  MonitorSelfCPUUsage = 0.012501
  MonitorSelfImageSize = 9968.000000
  MonitorSelfResidentSetSize = 4228
  MonitorSelfAge = 0
  MonitorSelfRegisteredSocketCount = 4
  HasSOAPInterface = TRUE
  JobQueueBirthdate = 1287455665
  WantResAd = TRUE
  DaemonStartTime = 1287624922
  UpdateSequenceNumber = 789
  ServerTime = 1287672844
  LastHeardFrom = 1287672844
  UpdatesTotal = 876
  UpdatesSequenced = 875
  UpdatesLost = 0
  UpdatesHistory = "0x00000000000000000000000000000000"

It's reporting 7 flocked jobs above. There are no flocked jobs in my pool.
creator: ichesal
